allow:

Add permission system, user groups, and enhanced customer management features

- Improve status configuration with reminding day, doctor check, and pricing options
- Add new pages: dynamic search, new customers, pool data, user groups
- Reorganize sidebar navigation with collapsible groups
- Add CustomerFilesModal and DashboardCalendar components
- Create middleware for route protection
- Extend payment and status composables with filtering
- Remove deprecated .gitlab-ci-dev.yml file
